subtasks.description: Scan the `experiments/` directory and produce a list (e.g., JSON or CSV) of all experiment sub‑directories whose last‑modified timestamp is older than 24 hours. Exclude any directory whose modification time is within the last 24 hours.

subtasks.description: For each directory listed in `old_experiments.json`, inspect its contents to decide if it holds *useful* output. subtasks.description: Delete all experiment directories that are **not** present in `useful_experiments.json` (i.e., empty or duplicate‑only directories).
